mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_WRITER , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , COUNT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
